representation_information.name: Sorenson Video Codec, Version 3
representation_information.description: Bitstream encoding for video developed by Sorenson Media, Inc. The SIGGRAPH education page states that the codec uses advanced vector quantization with motion compensation, and that the Developer Edition of the Sorenson codec offers variable bitrate encoding, temporal scalability, and the automatic determination of new keyframes.

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
